NewText_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Only <clr:0000>the clothes you're wearing that can
be dyed<clr:ffff> will change color!<sp:5:0:0> Are you sure
you wanna go with this outfit?
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>brownish ingredients<clr:ffff>, like
acorns or hightail lizards.
NewText_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, we can't dye <clr:0000>those clothes<clr:ffff>. It's a
fabric thing. <sp:5:0:0>Wanna change?
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>grayish ingredients<clr:ffff>, like
fireproof lizards or Keese wings.
NewText_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm... You don't have any <clr:0000>clothes that
can be dyed<clr:ffff>! <sp:3:0:2:0701>Come back after you
develop your wardrobe a bit.
NewText_71:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You may be a first-time customer, but
that's fine! We have a special introduction
to our new service for folks like you!<sp:0:4:0>Ta-da! Your very own introductory fabric!
NewText_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hmm... You don't quite have enough
ingredients to dye to that color.<sp:5:0:0> Sorry!
Talk_1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you wanna rework your paraglider with
some of that fabric you got? Or did you
bring me some new reference material?
NewText_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Choose <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> ingredients you'd like to use
in your dye!
Talk_1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Show me that reference and I'll rework
my magic for you!
NewText_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Did you want to try another color?<sp:5:0:0> Or do
you want to stop here?
NewText_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>Sometimes it's necessary to reset
everything! Throw it all out the window!

Let's go right back to the way things
were, shall we?<sp:5:0:0> Simpler times.

The clothes you're wearing now...are
those the ones we'll be changing? Or do
you need to change into something else?
NewText_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So will it be the clothes you're wearing
now? Or do you need to change?
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>bluish ingredients<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>like
chillshrooms or blue nightshade.
NewText_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you were looking to add some color to
your wardrobe, you found the right place!<sp:5:0:0>
Hue do you do?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>reddish ingredients<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>like
spicy peppers or apples.
NewText_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Oh, no, no, no, no, no.<sp:5:0:0> I'm sorry, but you
don't have <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Come on back some other time.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>yellowish ingredients<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>like
shock fruits or mighty bananas.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>whitish ingredients<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>like
Hylian rice or fresh milk.
NewText_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Oh, no, no, no, no, no. <sp:5:0:0>You don't even
have any <clr:0000>dye ingredients<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Come back later and we'll set you up.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>blackish ingredients<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>like
flint or hearty truffles.
NewText_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh? What <clr:0000>paraglider<clr:ffff>?! Must be some
kinda pigment of your imagination.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>When you have a paraglider for me to
rework, then we can talk!
NewText_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Come round again! Every day is a good
day to dye!
NewText_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?! Hoo-wee! <sp:5:1:0>That's a lovely <clr:0000>paraglider<clr:ffff>
you've got there!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>I mighta mentioned this, but we started
offering a <clr:0000>fabric rework service<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Bring me some <clr:0000>fabric<clr:ffff>, and I can rework
your paraglider with flying colors!
NewText_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wonderful. <sp:5:0:0>Now go wait up there.<sp:5:0:0>
I'll just be a minute.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>greenish ingredients<clr:ffff>, like
Hyrule herbs or Lizalfos tails.
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>You found yourself some fabric! I've been
dyeing to try this out!
NewText_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yeehoo!<sp:5:0:0> We made something very special
here if I do say so myself!
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>light bluish ingredients<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>like
Chuchu jelly or silent shrooms.
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>This your first time reworking a paraglider,
is it?<sp:0:4:0>Don't worry, I'll do all the work. You just
hand over the fabric and leave the rest
to me!
NewText_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Do you find this palette-able?<sp:5:0:0> If you'd
like to do a redye, just let me know!
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>navyish ingredients<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>like
luminous stones or bladed rhino beetles.
Talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Hey! I gotta favor to ask.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's not enough for me to just rework with
fabric you bring me. I wanna dye my hand
at makin' my own patterns!<sp:0:4:0>Just like Cece! Of course, hers are all
original designs.<sp:0:4:0>And makin' fabrics from scratch seems
like a lotta hard work.<sp:0:4:0>But that's where hue come in!<sp:0:4:0>Could you cast around for some reference
material I could use as inspiration?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>First, I'm thinking I wanna see visuals of
that monster they call a <clr:0000>Chuchu<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>That kind of Chuchu is everywhere, even
just outside the village! <sp:5:1:0>But I'm too paint-
hearted to get near them...<sp:0:4:0>I think if I could <clr:0000>see a regular Chuchu
for myself<clr:ffff>—<sp:5:0:0>not a Fire Chuchu or
Ice Chuchu—<sp:5:0:0>it would help a lot.
NewText_64:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If you get a <clr:0000>paraglider<clr:ffff>, I can rework it
using that fabric you found.<sp:0:4:0>What a marvelous dye that'll be, eh?
NewText_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Hateno dyeing <clr:ffff>is a traditional craft of
Hateno Village.<sp:0:4:0>Bring us the right <clr:0000>ingredients<clr:ffff>, and we can
dye just about anything to whatever color
you please!
Talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Didja bring me some reference material
for a <clr:0000>Chuchu <clr:ffff>pattern?
NewText_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Think of me if you find some new fabric,
won't you?<sp:0:4:0>We can rework your <clr:0000>paraglider<clr:ffff> with it for
you to fly the skies in style!
NewText_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>All right! Choose your <clr:0000>dye color <clr:ffff>wisely!<sp:5:0:0>
Or do you want to change clothes again?
NewText_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>With our new <clr:0000>fabric reworking service<clr:ffff>,
all you need is a bit of <clr:0000>fabric<clr:ffff> that we can
work with.<sp:0:4:0>We use it to reupholster things with nice
new <clr:0000>fabric<clr:ffff>—like a <clr:0000>paraglider<clr:ffff>, for example!
Talk_1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I can feel the inspiration bleeding into
reality! I'll start developing this pattern
at once!
NewText_67:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Any other requests? <sp:5:1:0>All my services are
just <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> each!
Talk_1016:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>All tone!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>With your help, I've made a very pretty
pattern! You can have the fabric I worked
up as thanks.
NewText_68:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Have you dropped by Ventest Clothing at
the village entrance yet?<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><sp:5:0:0>Cece<clr:ffff>, the famous designer who runs the
place now, cooked up the cutting-edge
design on this fabric!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Every region <clr:ffff>has its own unique fabric
designs. Keep an eye out for 'em
wherever you go!
Talk_1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>I knew I'd get a different result with some
quality reference! I betcha I could make
other patterns too.
NewText_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hmmm?! <sp:5:0:0>Sir, you're...exposed.<sp:0:4:0>Even one article of clothing would be
better than none!
Talk_1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>In fact, I made a list of patterns I'd like
to dye out.<sp:0:4:0>When you get your hands on anything
I might use as reference, come on in
and show it to me!<sp:0:4:0>If I have the reference, I can make an
original pattern for you to walk out the
door with!
Talk_1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Lookin' forward to seein' what we can
do together!
NewText_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Come back again. Every day is a good
day to dye!
NewText_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>All right, choose your <clr:0000>dye color <clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0>or go
ahead and <clr:0000>change clothes<clr:ffff>!
NewText_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I love the fact that someone so young is
so interested in our unique <clr:0000>Hateno dyes<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Might be Cece's influence, but that kinda
thing is catching on quite a bit with the
young folks these days.<sp:0:4:0>I'd be a fool not to seize the dyein' while
it's hot and let everyone know about what
we do here!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Let me give you all the colorful details of
how the magic works!
NewText_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's downright miraculous what a
difference a new set of duds makes.<sp:5:1:0>
You're looking very chic!
NewText_53: <sp:3:0:2:0000>Let's get this right on our first dye!
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>So, which fabric do you have in mind for
a paraglider rework today?
NewText_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?! Hoo-wee! <sp:5:1:0>That's a lovely <clr:0000>paraglider<clr:ffff>
you've got there!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Nowadays, not only do we dye clothes,
we also offer a <clr:0000>fabric rework service<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Bring me some <clr:0000>fabric<clr:ffff>, and I can rework
your paraglider with flying colors!
NewText_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>By the tints!<sp:5:0:0> We hardly ever get this
color to come out!
NewText_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Dyeing <clr:0000>clothes<clr:ffff> to the color of your
choice or <clr:0000>reworking paragliders with
some new cloth<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>Either way, it'll take just <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>!
NewText_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yeehoo! What a wonderful tone that is!
<sp:5:0:0>I might try that out on one of my outfits!
Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>That'll do 'er! <sp:5:1:0>Looking forward to your
next visit!<sp:0:4:0><snd:Happy>Now go out and paint the town red!
NewText_56:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now then! <sp:5:0:0>I can either <clr:0000>dye your clothes<clr:ffff>
or remove the dye from<clr:0000> some dyed duds
and return them to their original colorway<clr:ffff>!
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If you're fine with that one, then slip me
<clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>, and we'll get started!
NewText_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>If you have any <clr:0000>dye ingredients<clr:ffff>, it's
<clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> to dye an item...<sp:5:0:0> That includes
our service charge, of course.
Let's get going and dye your getup to...
Talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Thanks for the business! This won't take
a moment—<sp:5:1:0>no watching paint dry for you!
NewText_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>If you have any <clr:0000>dye ingredients<clr:ffff>, it's
<clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> to dye an item...<sp:5:0:0> That includes
our service charge, of course.
Let's get going and dye your getup to
the color of your choosing!
NewText_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Nowadays, not only do we dye clothes,
we also offer a <clr:0000>fabric rework service<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>For example, if you had something like
a <clr:0000>paraglider<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>Bring me some <clr:0000>fabric<clr:ffff>, the kind used in
huehickeys like a paraglider...<sp:0:4:0>And we can rework it with flying colors!
Talk_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Go on and show me the fabric you wanna
rework your paraglider with!
NewText_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hee har ha! <sp:5:0:0>If you're not a pigment of
my imagination, you must be a customer!
NewText_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>All right now... Stay like that and don't
move a muscle!
NewText_43: <sp:3:0:2:0000>All right now...hold on to your britches!
NewText_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>It's the Hateno tradition to dye a person's
<clr:0000>whole outfit<clr:ffff>, from head to toe, all at once!
Talk_1040:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>All tone!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I put dye, sweat, and tears into this
magnificent beauty. You can have the
fabric I worked on as thanks.
NewText_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>Get ready! Because we are going to dye<sp:5:0:0>
all the <clr:0000>clothes you're wearing<clr:ffff> at once!
Talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There used to be a fella called <clr:0000>Robbie <clr:ffff>at
the laboratory up on the hill.<sp:0:4:0>He had this mysterious device that could
store anything you could see as a picture.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>If I remember right, he called it a <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>With a huehicky like that, it'd be a snap
to get references for fabrics!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But he hasn't been around the laboratory
on the hill in a while. Must still be out at
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.
NewText_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>Another great day to dye that <clr:0000>whole
outfit<clr:ffff> all at once!
NewText_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>It's time to tint! Another day to dye that
<clr:0000>whole outfit <clr:ffff>all at once!
NewText_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>What do you know, you don't even have
any <clr:0000>dyed clothes<clr:ffff>! <sp:3:0:2:0701>Let's get some color
going here!
NewText_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>Well, this isn't so bad!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have need of my services at any
point,<sp:5:0:0> don't hesitate to call on me!
NewText_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>But the clothes you're wearing
haven't been dyed yet!

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Change your clothes or forget about it.
<sp:5:0:0>Your choice!
NewText_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I can also <clr:0000>remove color<clr:ffff> from dyed fabric
so your clothes will be restored to their
original, if not drab, luster.
Talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you get your hands on any other
reference materials, I wanna see 'em!
Leave no tone unturned!
NewText_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Welcome to <clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>, where we
live to dye!
Talk_1031: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>You didn't? All right, I can take a tint.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Let's start over. <sp:5:0:0>Welcome!
NewText_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>And the total price is <sp:5:0:0>just <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>!
So now...
Talk_1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:LaughL_01>I can't believe it...every pattern I had in
mind has bled through into reality!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>I'm as pleased as punch that I could
make all these pretty new fabrics.<sp:0:4:0>You should take 'em out for a spin up in
the clouds! I promise I won't leave you
high and dye!
NewText_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hm...I think nature's dye is pretty much
as intended. Not much to do about that.

Put some clothes on and we'll talk!
Talk_1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>Eh? That's the same fabric you got on it.
Guess you're set in your colorways.
NewText_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>These rainy days remind me of the most
romantic date I ever went on.

There we were, standing in the soaking
rain, and I got down on one knee to
propose. <sp:5:1:0>Couldn't have timed it better!
Talk_1036:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>Hmmm? I thought this was the part where
you'd show me a reference.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Well, when you do find some kinda
reference that sparks an idea, come
over and show me first thing!
Talk_1037:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Wouldja look at that! <sp:5:1:0>Now that's what I
call inspiring. I'll start developing this
pattern at once!
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>orangish ingredients<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>like
Keese eyeballs or amber.
Talk_1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's picture perfect! <sp:5:1:0>Way to get my
creative juices flowing again. I'll start
developing this pattern at once!
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>peachish ingredients<clr:ffff>, like
wildberries or rock salt.
Talk_1039:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>All tone!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Perfect enough to give me goosebumps,
that's for sure. You can have the fabric
I worked on as thanks.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>crimsonish ingredients<clr:ffff>, like
Goron spice or chickaloo tree nuts.
NewText_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You're wearing some clothes you <clr:0000>actually
can't dye<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0> Is that OK?
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll need <clr:0000>five light<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>yellowish ingredients<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
like Bokoblin fangs or opals.
